page.title: 15P.T.A. AND YOUTH CLUB.
page.content: The Parent/Teacher Association is made up of parents of school and pre school children and the teachers.It is run by a committee which meets every term.The PTA's aims are:to form links between teachers parents and children; to encourage community spirit and to raise money for equipment.It stages events such as a fun run,a pantomime,a firework display and rounders. It assists with outings and parties. There are 62 members of the {youth {club}but only 35 come regularly. It starts at{7.30pm}and finishes at 10.00pm on a Friday. The oldest member is 20 the youngest is 11. They have got two snooker tables, 1 pool table, a black and white TV, a colour TV, Atari games, table tennis and a record player.They play{rounders}and darts. They go swimming every Tuesday and organise other outings occasionally.
